title: 499. Don't Worry, Be Tacky
description: The British art superstar Flora Yukhnovich, the Freakonomist Steve Levitt, and the upstart American Basketball Association were all unafraid to follow their joy — despite sneers from the Establishment. Should we all be more willing to embrace the déclassé?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
